td.content: s:white male aged 50 Ys presents with moderate weak urinary stream of 7 weeks duration together with moderate tingling of the feet, moderate urinary hesitancy, Diabetes. o:Height 187 cm, Weight 76.4 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 17, HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, age-appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a:Type 2 Diabetes p:administered glimepiride - 4 mg daily, performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Term.SYMPTOM: Delay when starting to pass urine
